A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This movie is Horrible! The writing in this movie is non-sensible and downright disrespectful to movies that came before it. This movie offers very little new to the franchise and instead brings down beloved characters to their lowest for the sake of boosting up its new characters which btw the are poorly developed characters and feel forced. The only redeeming qualities this movie has is that the visuals and special effects look good also with the use of practical effects. The Action is decent but lacking compared to prior films. If you love Star Wars (especially the original trilogy)\, I highly recommend avoiding this awful film!
